page.title: 20Recreational Activities
page.content: There are no public swimming baths or leisure centres within 15 miles of the area. Gardening is a very popular activity, especially the growing of vegetables and fruit.Public recreation is centred upon The George & Dragon public house in Boldron where darts,dominoes,quoits and whist can be played.Residents are able to attend the Startforth Morritt Community Association which organises many events in the school.The village hall is used to a lesser degree. Family pastimes such as T.V. viewing, walking,board games,computer games and reading are much the same as in every other part of the country. { This Domesday Project survey has been {carried out during June & July,1985,by {ten 4th.Year Juniors(assisted by their {Class Teacher and the Headmaster)from {Startforth Morritt Memorial C.E.School
